Say, Supra, if you're reading this: will there be compositions from you in Hotline Miami 2?

text: Absolutely superb game. Unique art style, great atmosphere, INCREDIBLE music and a difficulty level that is outright sadistic until you get the hang of a map. Instant restarts after death keep the frustration down. Highly recommended!

author: Hadron

text: This is a game that I was intrigued by at first, then saw the difficulty, then was instantly turned off. I get frustrated easily. Then I watched another few videos, was even MORE interested, and when the Steam sale came along I just bought it on a whim. Now? I'm addicted. Beat it last night, and I fucking love it. It's hard, really hard, but OH so rewarding when you succeed and make it through an entire level untouched. And the music? Just amazing. So thanks for reminding me to play more, lol

text: Brilliant OST for a brilliant game

text: I'm fond of Electric Dreams myself. But the soundtrack as a whole is just amazing. I love the club atmosphere they threw into it :)

author: SupraDarky

text: Only having to scroll down a little to get to the same game's previous upload sends me back to 2007 when I first started making this list. I don't have much more to say about this awesome game. I guess if I had to resume my thoughts on it, it'd be how pure its gameplay is. Nothing too complicated, you're just tasked to kill in the most efficient wayï»¿ while constantly risking being taken down in one shot. The fact that you restart instantly when you die makes it very addictive, no downtime.
author: SupraDarky
